text: Cardinal Richelieu (also known as Richelieu) is a 19th-century painted in oil by the italian painter Giuseppe Amisani, made in 1890, is kept in the Villa Necchi Campiglio of Milano in Italy.Giuseppe Amisani, Cardinale Richelieu. Figura maschile, Villa Necchi Campiglio, Via Mozart, 12 Giuseppe Amisani's work portrays Cardinal Richelieu. ==Other websites== * * "Cardinale Richelieu, Museo Villa Necchi Campiglio, Milano ==References== Category:Milan Category:Paintings by Giuseppe Amisani Category:1890s paintings
title: Cardinal Richelieu (Amisani)
